title: CAS Space conducts first suborbital launch and capsule landing test
description:
Chinese commercial firm CAS Space launched its first Lihong-1 suborbital flight and recovery test mission, seeing a successful parachute descent of the capsule.

The post CAS Space conducts first suborbital launch and capsule landing test appeared first on SpaceNews.
